name: cell-battery
effect: Held : When the holder takes electric-type damage from a move, its Attack rises by one stage and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: Raises the holder’s Attack by one stage when it takes Electric-type damage.

flavor_text.x_y: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Attack if hit with an Electric- type attack. It can only be used once.
